txt.en: Your mission is to defeat the Orc archers outside Shathur-munzu.\n\nSpeak to Hórin to travel to Shathur-munzu.

'I have a new mission for you, [placeholder].\n\n'Shathur-munzu, the abandoned fort in Duskenvale, had been quiet since the departure of the warg chieftain, but the scouts have reported a new Orkish presence. We cannot allow them to set up a base to the south and surround us in the battle to come! Sneak around their defences and defeat their archers. Then reinforcements can secure the fort!'
Complete Mission: Archers at the Gate
DNT - 'When you are ready, the scouts will lead you to Shathur-munzu. Good luck!'
'Well done! Though the great prize of Gundabad stands in front of us, we must remember to also protect our rear!'
The mission is complete.\n\nSpeak to Hórin for your reward.
The Orcs and Wargs have returned to Shathur-munzu, attempting to set up a new base south of the warfront….\n\nYour mission is to defeat the Orc archers outside Shathur-munzu.
You have been tasked with dispatching the Orc archers defending Shathur-munzu.
Monsters in this mission will attempt to summon allies to the fight.
